verses.name: Jeremiah 9:21
verses.text: For death is come up into our windows, and is entered into our palaces, to cut off the children from without, and the young men from the streets.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:22
verses.text: Speak, Thus saith the Lord, Even the carcases of men shall fall as dung upon the open field, and as the handful after the harvestman, and none shall gather them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 9:23
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, Let not the wise man glory in his wisdom, neither let the mighty man glory in his might, let not the rich man glory in his riches:
